name: nfiota
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ F/(s0, iota(s1, w0))
⊣ (T → F/(s0, iota(s1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ F/(s0, iota(s1, w0))
⊣ (T → F/(s0, iota(s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wtru)
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0))
-| wnf(s1, wtru)
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

|- wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the ` iota ` class. (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-2011.)
